info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Washington...northwestern Kane and south central Iron Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 300 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cedar City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cedar City, Zion National Park, Kanarraville and Hamilton Fort. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 48 and 61. Utah Route 56 between mile markers 57 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
